strings.Value: "Stealing? How could you even think that! I was just looking for the toilet."
[Attack] "You should have pretended not to notice me."
"Pretend you didn't notice me, and you might survive to see tomorrow..."
[Bribe the barbarian with 100 coins] "This is just a misunderstanding. Surely we can settle this matter peacefully."
"Hey! What're you doing? You trying to steal from us?"
"Ha ha ha! You townsfolk are hilarious! {mf|He|She} wants a toilet! Just go outside and use the bushes!"
"You take me for an idiot? Bad call!"
{n}The barbarian stares into your eyes coldly, then looks aside, steps back, and disappears.{/n}
{n}With a grunt of contempt, the barbarian quickly stows the coins.{/n} "You city folk are all just thieves, just wanting to snatch and flee. Fine, then, get lost before I give you what you deserve."

{n}Regongar draws his blade, which crackles with tiny sparks of lightning.{/n} "Shut up, turn around, and walk away. Forget you ever saw us. Do what I say, and maybe — just maybe — you and your worthless friends will have the chance to see tomorrow. You get me?"
